title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; pip install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs, embeddings, or tool-calling agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with history, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama.

title: ollama-cpp
summary: Discussion thread showing how llama.cpp powers Ollama backends and custom builds.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Dockerfiles and compose examples for CPU/GPU containers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for generative QA and embedding pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n workflow node to call Ollama chat/completions inside no-code automations.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# / .NET client for Ollama with async I/O and nullable ref types.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing typed APIs and streaming support for Ollama.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama endpoints via Django REST framework.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service that proxies and extends Ollama with rate-limiting and OpenAI compatibility.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot that answers questions using a local Ollama model via Socket-Mode.

title: ollama-models
summary: Registry of community-contributed Modelfiles for Llama, Mistral, CodeLlama, Phi, etc.
